snippet: The paralympic champion Oscar Pistorius was charged with murder after his girlfriend, Reeva Steenkamp, was fatally shot in his home in Pretoria, according to South African police officials.
abstract: South African police say paralympic champion and Olympic competitor Oscar Pistorius is charged with murder after his girlfriend, Reeva Steenkamp, is fatally shot in his home in Pretoria; development stuns nation that had elevated Pistorius as an emblem of ability to overcome acute adversity and a symbol of South Africa's ability to achieve on the world stage; early reports that he mistook her for an intruder give way to news of prior complaints of domestic violence.

byline.contributor: Alan Cowell contributed reporting from Paris, Jeré Longman from Philadelphia and Mukelwa Hlatshwayo from Pretoria, South Africa.

lead_paragraph: The paralympic champion Oscar Pistorius was charged with murder after his girlfriend, Reeva Steenkamp, was fatally shot in his home in Pretoria, according to South African police officials.

headline.seo: Oscar Pistorius Charged With Murder in South Africa
headline.main: A Nation Reels as a Star Runner Is Charged in Girlfriend’s Death
headline.print_headline: A Nation Reels as a Star Runner Is Charged in Girlfriend’s Death
